item.description:
I have always wanted to experience the awesome art of glass blowing first hand, and I am so excited to have found Diablo Glass & Metal in Mission Hill! On the last Friday of every month they welcome the public to join them for an evening of glass, friends and wine. I've heard that this is a really fun event! Learn the basics of glass blowing (yes, you'll actually be able to make your own piece!), drink great wine and watch a professional demonstration. It's only $95 for this full experience!

If you want to attend, please RSVP on Meetup here and then sign-up/pay with Diablo online at ($95):
RESERVE YOUR SPOT: Register Online with Diablo Here

These Friday sessions fill-up very fast, so don't delay in registering!

Spend three hours in one of their studios to experience an introductory taste of working with hot glass in glassblowing and beadmaking.

Workshop from 6.30 - 9.00
Glassblowing demonstration: 9.00 - 9.30
Talk & Drink until 11pm!
item.how_to_find_us: Meet at Studio or call Bernadette's cell: 617-372-3557
